thread.title: ‘Not very optimistic’ NK will denuclearize: Rubio

title: ‘Not very optimistic’ NK will denuclearize: Rubio
text:
‘Not very optimistic’ NK will denuclearize: Rubio 9:07pm IST - 00:43
Republican Senator Marco Rubio says he's 'not very optimistic' North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will give up his nuclear program. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Republican Senator Marco Rubio says he's 'not very optimistic' North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will give up his nuclear program. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KZKr7z
